long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This version of Strive desktop app add-in supporting the below URL patterns only

Pattern: https://*.service-now.com/navpage.do/*

Support : PRB, RLSE, RITM, SCTASK, INC tickets

[v.1.0.1] -  Support PRB* tickets
[v.1.0.2] - UI Update & Bug fix
